title: Electric cars aren’t just vehicles
description:
They’re big batteries that can power homes and businesses, too. Recode’s Neel Dhanesha explains. 
Read Neel’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/22872237/biden-electric-vehicle-batteries-clean-energy
Today’s episode was produced by Victoria Dominguez, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions) and hosted by Adam Clark Estes. 
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
